aboutUs.title: ABOUT US
content: Fortuna Navale is a leading provider of qualified personnel for projects in construction, shipbuilding, industry, and other sectors.

We specialize in providing flexible staffing solutions tailored to our clients' needs, from short-term projects with a small number of specialists to long-term contracts with teams of up to 60 people.

sections.title: Welding
sections.content: We provide certified specialists for the following types of welding:
list: MIG (131), MAG (135, 136), MMA, TIG (141), Gas welding
Our welders comply with the ISO 9606-1 standard and have experience working both in workshops and on industrial sites.

sections.title: Insulation
sections.content: We offer comprehensive solutions for thermal, cryogenic, sound, and acoustic insulation, including:
list: Processing of pipelines, tanks, vessels, and industrial facilities
Application of modern materials and technologies in the oil and gas, chemical, and other industries.

sections.title: Installation of industrial equipment
list: Disassembly, transportation, and installation of heavy equipment.
Foundation preparation, leveling, and commissioning of facilities.

sections.title: Painting and surface protection
list: Painting of large metal structures using modern materials.
Sandblasting to remove old paint and corrosion.
Application of protective coatings for durability and corrosion control.

aboutUs.title: About Us
content: Fortuna Navale is a leading provider of qualified personnel for projects in construction, shipbuilding, industry, and other sectors.

We specialize in providing flexible staffing solutions tailored to our clients' needs, from short-term projects with a small number of specialists to long-term contracts with teams of up to 60 people.

sections.content: Professional preparation and laying of cable routes on a vessel, including design, installation, and testing in accordance with international standards.

On this platform for wind turbine installation, our team successfully completed a number of key tasks, including welding handrails, installing decks, installing bird protection nets, as well as carrying out other technical work such as laying cables, installing equipment, and setting up systems.
Installation and commissioning of the main engine on a vessel, including mounting, configuration, and integration with ship systems.

aboutUs.title: ABOUT US
content: Fortuna Navale is a leading provider of qualified personnel for projects in construction, shipbuilding, industry, and other sectors.

We specialize in providing flexible staffing solutions tailored to our clients' needs, from short-term projects with a small number of specialists to long-term contracts with teams of up to 60 people.

ourMission.title: Our Mission
ourMission.content: To provide clients with highly qualified personnel who are capable of solving the most complex tasks while maintaining the highest standards of quality and safety. We strive to become a reliable partner that helps companies focus on their core business processes by taking on all aspects of personnel recruitment, organization, and management.

ourMission.title: Development Goal
ourMission.content: To achieve our ambitious goals, we are actively developing our ship repair team. We are looking for talented, motivated, and professional employees who share our values and are ready to become part of a team capable of solving the most complex tasks.

ourMission.title: Our Vision
ourMission.content: We strive to become a leader in staffing solutions in Europe, establishing long-term partnerships with clients. Our goal is to provide services of the highest quality that help our clients achieve their strategic goals while being confident in the reliability and professionalism of our team.

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Us?
whyChooseUs.content: Fortuna Navale is a team of professionals ready to become your reliable partner in realizing the most ambitious projects. Contact us to discuss your tasks and find the optimal solution!

sections.title: Efficiency
sections.content: We provide the necessary resources for your projects in the shortest possible time, minimizing downtime and delays.

sections.title: Qualifications
sections.content: All our employees have relevant certificates, confirmed work experience, and regularly undergo training to maintain a high level of professionalism.

sections.title: Flexibility
sections.content: We offer adaptive cooperation conditions, allowing you to start, pause, or resume working with us at any time.

sections.title: Integrated Approach
sections.content: We take on all stages of personnel interaction â€” from selection and onboarding to organizing work on-site and quality control.

projects.title: Projects
content: One of the vessels where mechanical works were performed by our company's specialists at FortunaNavale, starting from the design and development stage.
Development and manufacturing of specialized support structures for the main engine of a cruise liner.
Installation and commissioning of the main engine on a vessel, including mounting, configuration, and integration with ship systems.
Our highly qualified welders have the necessary experience and are ready to execute even the most complex projects and tasks, ensuring the highest quality of work.
On this magnificent yacht, the project's realization was made possible thanks to the professionalism, efforts, and contribution of our employees, who made significant efforts to achieve the result.
Our experienced installers perform work on installing protective nets on platforms, ensuring high quality and adherence to all technical standards.
Professional preparation and laying of cable routes on a vessel, including design, installation, and testing in accordance with international standards.

On this platform for wind turbine installation, our team successfully completed a number of key tasks, including welding handrails, installing decks, installing bird protection nets, as well as carrying out other technical work such as laying cables, installing equipment, and setting up systems.

vacancies.title: Vacancies

didntFind.title: Didn't find a vacancy you are interested in?
didntFind.content: Leave your details so we can notify you when a vacancy opens up.

vacancies.jobInterested: If you are interested in this vacancy, fill out the form below

shipbuilder-1.title: Shipbuilder
shipbuilder-1.excerpt: If you have experience working with metal structures, assembling and repairing vessels, and a desire to work in a stable company, we will be happy to see you on our team.
responsibilities: Assembly, installation, and repair of vessel hulls according to drawings and technical documentation.
Workinjobg with metal structures, welding, riveting, sealing seams.
Installation and testing of ship equipment.
Interaction with engineers and other specialists to control the quality of work.
Compliance with safety regulations and shipbuilding standards.
requirements: Knowledge of vessel assembly and repair technologies.
Ability to work with tools and equipment (welding machines, metal cutting, etc.).
Physical stamina, responsibility, and attention to detail.
Readiness to work in shipyard conditions (open and closed workshops, water bodies).
advantages: Availability of specialized education [shipbuilding, mechanical engineering, metal processing].
weOffer: Opportunities for career growth and training.
Work in a large shipbuilding company with modern equipment.
Friendly team and safe working conditions.
